title: 无尽配方编辑
author: 逍遥灬路人
txt_content: 求一个1.7.10的可视化无尽配方编辑器

replies.txt_content:
试试看小莫这个mod
[1.7.10][Another Magic Recipe——另一款可视化合成表修改MOD]更简单的合成修改
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-850359-1-1.html
支持1.7.10无尽的可视化合成

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
1.7.10没有可视化的
你可以看下面的作为参考 不过只有9x9的方法
删除合成mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.remove(<avaritia:skullfire_sword>);复制代码
添加合成mods.avaritia.ExtremeCrafting.addShaped("SKULLFIRESWORD", <avaritia:skullfire_sword> * 1, [[null, null, null, null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>], [null, null, null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:1>],[null, null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null],[null, null, null, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:6>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null, null],[null, <extrabotany:material:8>, null, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null, null, null],[null, null, <extrabotany:material:8>, <avaritia:resource:1>, <avaritia:resource:1>, null, null, null, null],[null, null, <avaritia:block_resource>, <extrabotany:material:8>, null, null, null, null, null],[null, <avaritia:block_resource>, null, null, <extrabotany:material:8>, null, null, null, null],[<avaritia:endest_pearl>, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null]]);复制代码

replies.author: 逍遥灬路人
replies.txt_content: 没有的话能删除无尽砍头剑的合成也行
